item.title: Opinion Poll by Pitagórica for Jornal de Notícias, 24–27 September 2019 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Partido Social Democrata: 23.1–30.2%

  • LIVRE: 0.7–2.6%
  • Iniciativa Liberal: 1.1–3.5%
  • Aliança: 0.3–1.7%
  • Chega: 0.6–2.4%
